climbs.name: The Mystic Art of Erasing All Signs

content.description: Sit on the rock at the left end of the boulder.  Reach directly above your head for two small pockety/crimpy holds.  Get your feet on, reach left to a huge pocket, then fire to the top. The top out is the crux.

Sit start on the right end of the rail, in front of the right-hand maple tree.  Fire up and right to a jug. Left to a jug just below the small roof. Traverse below the roof until  you're below a zigzagging seam(just left of the left maple).  Fire up to a jug beneath the top.  Top out with a crux mantle move.
content.protection: A large pad or 2 pads. If mantles at this level are at the edge of your ability, you'll want a spotter to keep you from slamming in to the tree when you fall.
content.location: Mostly on the part of the boulder that is between the 2 maple trees sitting in front of the boulder.

content.description: Sit start on the right end of the rail, in front of the right-hand maple tree. Fire up and right to a jug.(This is the same start and first move as "The Distance")  Continue diagnoling to the right and up through the steep overhang, to a crux mantle near the right end of the boulder.
content.location: The right half of the boulder.

content.description:
At the intersection of  the South Trail and the spur to the Gateway's Main Trail, look North through the trees.  You'll see a too-small-to-climb-on boulder.  Walk to this, and you'll see the Crappy Overhang to the north. 

  N 44deg 25.756'   W 72deg 55.257'
